name: code-review-suite
description: A suite containing both the Code Review and Live Classroom applications

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix "Code review"" "npm run dev --prefix "live classroom""
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix "Code review"" "npm run start --prefix "live classroom""
scripts.deploy: git init && git add . && git commit -m "Initial commit with full project" && git remote add origin https://github.com/parag8487/Code_review_platform.git && git push -u origin master
